dunes-script-module.name: generateRandomNumber
dunes-script-module.description: Generates a random number between 1 and whatever number is passed in as input
dunes-script-module.param: Maximum number in the range of numbers to generate
dunes-script-module.script:
// Return a random number between 1 and max, inclusive.
return randomNumber = (Math.ceil(Math.random() * max)) - 1;
